description: The draft legislation is given added impetus following a series of recent attacks by extremists.
title: France radical Islamists: Cabinet backs law targeting extremism
title_page: France radical Islamists: Cabinet backs law targeting extremism - BBC News
maintext: Meanwhile, separate to the law, President Macron has agreed with France's Muslim Council (CFCM) for a national council of imams to be set up. The president is seeking to put a stop to hundreds of foreign imams practising in France.
